content: Is there a licence fee for NCTS and SNOMED CT? If so how much per year or one off? I am licensing as an organisation (my small IT business).
no license fee for either, though you have to register your snomed usage on the agency web site
Which agency? E.g. Queensland Health or ADHA?
You can register for the NCTS at https://www.healthterminologies.gov.au/
You accept SNOMED CT licensing as part of the registration process

You can register for the NCTS at https://www.healthterminologies.gov.au/

Yes that is what I am trying to do but got stuck with long winded terms and conditions when I register as an organisation. I am a sole director company.

What is an international member country? My app is for Queensland, Australia. Is Australia an international member country?

Is there a way of getting a copy of the Australian licence?

I have SNOMED CT and Snapper licences but not Australian licence which was below SNOMED CT on registration form.

I found it. It was so long it had been truncated in my files but I pasted it into a text file.

I increased size of field so can now save the terms without truncation: MEDIUMTEXT.
